name: Deeper Voyage (2022 Team 7)
description:
Our civilization has run out of energy. You must dive to the surface of the planet and plant the beacon onboard this ship. Then we can extract energy from the planet's surface and our people will be saved. You can mine crystals and minerals to fuel and upgrade this ship along the way. This mission is our only hope.

Controls

Player Controls:

Use [WASD] and the mouse to move

Use [E] to interact with parts of the Ship

Hold [Left Mouse Button] to use the mining tool when outside the Ship

Hold [Space] or [Shift] to move up or down respectively when outside the Ship

Piloting Controls:

Hold [Spacebar] to use the forward thruster

Hold [Shift] + [Spacebar] to use the reverse thruster

Move the mouse in the direction you want to turn towards

Keeping the mouse in the middle of the mousepad will keep your ship straight
